B E G I S T 

B

Book - Class in <Unnamed>
A representation of a Book within a library program where books can be checked out and then returned.
Book() - Constructor for class Book
Default Constructor creates an Object for the Book The Color Purple by Alice Walker.
Book(String, String) - Constructor for class Book
Overload Constructor accepts values for the title and author of the Book
Book(Book) - Constructor for class Book
Copy Constructor creates a duplicate Book Object
booksOnPlatform - Static variable in class Book
A running tally of the number of Books that have been constructed

E

equals(Object) - Method in class Book
the equals method comparing a Book to other Objects Two Books are considered equal if their titles and authors match.

G

GENRE - Static variable in class Book
All Books on the platform share the same genre of "YA Fiction"
getAuthor() - Method in class Book
Accessor for the Book's author
getTitle() - Method in class Book
Accessor for the String representation of the title

I

isAvailable() - Method in class Book
The accessor for the boolean representation of whether or not the Book is currently checked in or out

S

setAuthor(String) - Method in class Book
Mutator for the Book's author
setAvailable(boolean) - Method in class Book
Mutator for the boolean representation of whether or not the book is currently available to be checked out
setTitle(String) - Method in class Book
Mutator for the String representation of the tile

T

toString() - Method in class Book
The textual representation for a Book includes all private member variables and a decorative border
